about_the_game:
"

Showdown in Skull Canyon

The mutants living in Skull Canyon have always flown under the radar-until now. In this adventure for Fallout: The Roleplaying Game, the player characters are drawn into a conflict between the New California Republic Rangers and the seemingly peaceful mutants of Skull Canyon. Unusual activity in the area has raised the Rangers' suspicions, and the mutants may not be quite what anyone expects. As the PCs navigate the challenges of exploring the canyon, battling mutant rattlesnakes, conducting diplomatic talks, and deciding how they deal with moral questions, they will have to weigh the consequences of their actions and ultimately decide the fate of Skull Canyon's unusual inhabitants. The Showdown in Skull Canyon features:
  • Adapted from the 28-page adventure in three acts for character levels 1-5.
  • Explore the mysterious Skull Canyon and interact with its unusual inhabitants.
  • Investigate the growing tensions between the NCR Rangers and the mutants.
  • Choose a side and/or help resolve the dispute.
This requires the core rules found in the Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook but could be played using the rules and pregen characters found in the Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Starter Set. "
